name: react-templates
description: Light weight templates for react -> write html get valid react code

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover test/src/test.js -- --require test/support/env --reporter dot --check-leaks test/ test/acceptance/
scripts.patch: npm version patch -m"update version to %s" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m"update version to %s" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.major: npm version major -m"update version to %s" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.babel: rm -rf build && babel src/ --out-dir dist && babel test/src/ --out-dir dist-test/src && cp -R test/data dist-test/data
scripts.babel2: rm -rf build && babel src/ --out-dir build/src && babel test/src/ --out-dir build/test/src && cp -R test/data build/test/data && cp package.json build/
scripts.all: npm run lint && npm run babel && npm run test

author: Avi Marcus
